div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1016 Olbia (mod. Parutino), 1956 Burial: mid 4th cent. B.C. Contents: 5 AE Olbia: 4 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 8 [1], 13 [2], 22? [1]) Istrus: 1 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 8, 7) Disposition: Leningrad (Institute) Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
